description: New tab geared towards developers, featuring to-do lists, calendar, and social media feed. Also a weather widget and pomodoro clock.
name: Geckos Tab - Developer Oriented New Tab
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://apis.google.com/ https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com https://connect.facebook.net https://*.facebook.com https://use.fontawesome.com; object-src 'self'
